:::Sharpedge/Godfather/Hurricane/Wheeljack/Banzai-Tron/Airazor/Tigerhawk:::

Sharpedge: A cease fire? You mean the battle's almost over?
Godfather: Dont ask dumb questions shark-boy. Yo Shockaract, can we shoot the 
Maxis anyway?
~~~~~
::Wheeljack was almost finished rebuilding Treadshot::
Wheeljack: All i need is a DNA scanner...
Hurricane: Here ya go.
::He hands him one. Wheeljack hooks up the machine, and the process begins. 
The scanners scan a crab and the formerly blank stasis pod opened up, 
revealing a giant red crab::
Banzai-Tron: Banzai-Tron, Transform!
::He transforms into a really tall robot mode(15 feet)::
Hurricane: Is that you Treadshot?
Banzai-Tron: In the mind, yes. In the flesh, no! sSo uh, what happened?
Wheeljack: You were killed in the battle.
::Banzai-Tron remembers::
Banzai-Tron: Ah, yes. That bitch birdbot broke my neck! Grrr, i will have my 
revenge, you'll see!
~~~~~
::Airazor and Tigerhawk wake up::
Tigerhawk: Ahh, that was good.
Airazor: Agreed, love.
::They kissed again, and got up::
Tigerhawk:Im not going back to the Maximals yet, how about you?
Airazor: Not until that battle ends and everything is peaceful.
Tigerhawk: Good idea, beloved.
Airazor: So, what do we do now?
Tigerhawk: What do you say we just take a walk?
Airazor: Sounds good.
::They start walking in no general direction. Back in the area where thye had 
been abducted, the stasis pod they had left behind so long ago started 
glowing::

--part1_fb.10b06801.279f7f2e_boundary
